column1: The day of surgery for your child
- If your child is having major surgery, your child will stay in the hospital after the surgery.
To make sure your child is healthy and ready for surgery, they will: - Check your child's height, weight, and vital signs - Ask about your child's health.
- Do a physical exam on your child To get your child ready for surgery, the surgical team will: - Confirm the location and type of your child's surgery.
- The day of surgery will be busy for your child and you.
If your child is having pain, the nurse will give your child pain medicine and any other medicine your child needs.
